name: .SSP File Extension
summary: Learn about .SSP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An SSP file is a webpage script created using syntax from HTML and Scala, a general-purpose programming language. It contains HTML code and embedded "Ssp" tags which are evaluated to page text. SSP files are used to generate static webpages.

content: SSP files can be evaluated to HTML files using Scalate, a template engine used to generate web documents. Similar to PHP, ASP, and JSP parsers, Scalate checks for opening and closing tags that demarcate Scala code. SSP uses <% ... %> tags.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.caption: SSP file open in Serato Studio
